files.patch:
@@ -27,33 +27,33 @@
     <hibernate_sequences sequence_name="SEQ_RAttrValue" sequence_next_hi_value="1000"/>
     <hibernate_sequences sequence_name="SEQ_MAttrValue" sequence_next_hi_value="1000"/>
 
-    <SyncopeConfiguration confKey="token.length" confValue="256"/>
-    <SyncopeConfiguration confKey="token.expireTime" confValue="60"/>
-    <SyncopeConfiguration confKey="token.encryption.key" confValue="1abcdefghil3mnopqrstuvz2"/>
-    <SyncopeConfiguration confKey="smtp.host" confValue="smtp.ngi.it"/>
-    <SyncopeConfiguration confKey="mail.templates.url" confValue="http://localhost:8080/syncope/mailTemplates/"/>
-    <SyncopeConfiguration confKey="activate.email.from" confValue="syncope@googlecode.com"/>
-    <SyncopeConfiguration confKey="activate.email.subject" confValue="Welcome to Syncope!"/>
-    <SyncopeConfiguration confKey="activate.email.template.html" confValue="registration.html"/>
-    <SyncopeConfiguration confKey="activate.email.template.txt" confValue="registration.txt"/>
-    <SyncopeConfiguration confKey="generateToken.email.from" confValue="syncope@googlecode.com"/>
-    <SyncopeConfiguration confKey="generateToken.email.subject" confValue="Syncope: reset requested"/>
-    <SyncopeConfiguration confKey="generateToken.email.template.html" confValue="generateToken.html"/>
-    <SyncopeConfiguration confKey="generateToken.email.template.txt" confValue="generateToken.txt"/>
-    <SyncopeConfiguration confKey="verifyToken.email.from" confValue="syncope@googlecode.com"/>
-    <SyncopeConfiguration confKey="verifyToken.email.subject" confValue="Syncope: reset successful"/>
-    <SyncopeConfiguration confKey="verifyToken.email.template.html" confValue="verifyToken.html"/>
-    <SyncopeConfiguration confKey="verifyToken.email.template.txt" confValue="verifyToken.txt"/>
-    <SyncopeConfiguration confKey="servicelayer.baseurl" confValue="http://www.google.it/"/>
-    <SyncopeConfiguration confKey="identityconnectors.bundle.directory" confValue="${bundles.directory}"/>
-    <SyncopeConfiguration confKey="users.attributes.view" confValue="userId;"/>
+    <SyncopeConf confKey="token.length" confValue="256"/>
+    <SyncopeConf confKey="token.expireTime" confValue="60"/>
+    <SyncopeConf confKey="token.encryption.key" confValue="1abcdefghil3mnopqrstuvz2"/>
+    <SyncopeConf confKey="smtp.host" confValue="smtp.ngi.it"/>
+    <SyncopeConf confKey="mail.templates.url" confValue="http://localhost:8080/syncope/mailTemplates/"/>
+    <SyncopeConf confKey="activate.email.from" confValue="syncope@googlecode.com"/>
+    <SyncopeConf confKey="activate.email.subject" confValue="Welcome to Syncope!"/>
+    <SyncopeConf confKey="activate.email.template.html" confValue="registration.html"/>
+    <SyncopeConf confKey="activate.email.template.txt" confValue="registration.txt"/>
+    <SyncopeConf confKey="generateToken.email.from" confValue="syncope@googlecode.com"/>
+    <SyncopeConf confKey="generateToken.email.subject" confValue="Syncope: reset requested"/>
+    <SyncopeConf confKey="generateToken.email.template.html" confValue="generateToken.html"/>
+    <SyncopeConf confKey="generateToken.email.template.txt" confValue="generateToken.txt"/>
+    <SyncopeConf confKey="verifyToken.email.from" confValue="syncope@googlecode.com"/>
+    <SyncopeConf confKey="verifyToken.email.subject" confValue="Syncope: reset successful"/>
+    <SyncopeConf confKey="verifyToken.email.template.html" confValue="verifyToken.html"/>
+    <SyncopeConf confKey="verifyToken.email.template.txt" confValue="verifyToken.txt"/>
+    <SyncopeConf confKey="servicelayer.baseurl" confValue="http://www.google.it/"/>
+    <SyncopeConf confKey="identityconnectors.bundle.directory" confValue="${bundles.directory}"/>
+    <SyncopeConf confKey="users.attributes.view" confValue="userId;"/>
 
     <USchema name="surname" type="String" virtual="0"
-                mandatoryCondition="true" multivalue="0" uniquevalue="0" readonly="0"/>
+                mandatoryCondition="true" multivalue="0" uniqueConstraint="0" readonly="0"/>
     <USchema name="firstname" type="String" virtual="0"
-                mandatoryCondition="false" multivalue="0" uniquevalue="0" readonly="0"/>
+                mandatoryCondition="false" multivalue="0" uniqueConstraint="0" readonly="0"/>
     <USchema name="email" type="String" virtual="0"
-                mandatoryCondition="false" multivalue="1" uniquevalue="0" readonly="0"
+                mandatoryCondition="false" multivalue="1" uniqueConstraint="0" readonly="0"
                 validatorClass="org.syncope.core.persistence.validation.attrvalue.EmailAddressValidator"/>
                
     <UDerSchema name="username" expression="firstname + '.' + surname"/>
@@ -66,7 +66,7 @@
     <SyncopeRole id="0" name="/" inheritAttributes="0" inheritDerivedAttributes="0"/>
 
     <MSchema name="subscriptionDate" type="Date" virtual="0"
-                      mandatoryCondition="false" multivalue="0" uniquevalue="0" readonly="0"
+                      mandatoryCondition="false" multivalue="0" uniqueConstraint="0" readonly="0"
                       conversionPattern="yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss.SSSZ"/>
 
 </dataset>
